sentence.Network_en: Can an experimentalist be a good physics teacher?
sentence.Network_cn: 实验物理学家可能成为一个好的物理老师 吗 ?

sentence.Network_en: And Turner , ever the experimentalist, took the challenge.
sentence.Network_cn: 而作为实验主义者的透纳迎接了这个挑战.

sentence.Network_en: Since Fermi's death in 1954, no physicist has been at once a master experimentalist leading theoretician.
sentence.Network_cn: 自1954年费米去世后, 还没有哪一位物理学家同时是一名精通的实验主义者和一名最主要的理论家.
